about.title: A story of
about.subtitle: From mother to certified consultant
about.paragraph1: My journey into lactation consulting began over 5 years ago when I became a mother for the first time. The challenges I faced motivated me to study this beautiful field deeply and help other mothers.
about.paragraph2: I completed international IBCLC certification courses and have worked with over 500 families, each with their unique story. My passion is to provide personalized support, adapted to the needs of each mother and baby.
about.paragraph3: I firmly believe that every mother deserves to be heard, understood, and supported on this wonderful journey. I am here for you, with empathy, experience, and practical solutions.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section1Content: Marina Cociug - Lactation Consultant is committed to protecting your personal data privacy. This policy explains what data we collect, how we use it, and your rights under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
privacy.section2Content: We collect the following information: full name, email address, phone number, pregnancy and birth information, baby's age, breastfeeding history, current concerns, and goals. This data is necessary to provide personalized consultations and appropriate support.
privacy.section3Content: Data is used exclusively for: scheduling and conducting consultations, communicating with you via email or phone, maintaining consultation records for continuity, improving our services, and sending educational materials (only with your explicit consent).
privacy.section4Content: We do not sell, rent, or share your data with third parties for marketing purposes. Data may only be shared with: video conferencing platforms (for online consultations), payment processors (for secure transactions), and hosting service providers (who comply with GDPR).
privacy.section5Content: We take technical and organizational measures to protect data: encrypted SSL/TLS connections, restricted access through authentication, regular backups, compliance with GDPR protocols, and ongoing staff training in data protection.
privacy.section6Content: Under GDPR, you have the following rights: access to personal data, rectification of incorrect data, erasure of data ('right to be forgotten'), restriction of processing, data portability, and right to object to processing. To exercise these rights, contact us at info@marinacociug.ro.
privacy.section7Content: We retain your data for: duration of our collaboration plus 3 years (for medical records), 7 years for tax and accounting documents, or until consent withdrawal (for marketing materials).
privacy.section8Content: Our website uses cookies to improve user experience. For more details, see our Cookie Policy.
privacy.section9Content: For privacy-related questions, contact us: Email: info@marinacociug.ro, Phone: +40 123 456 789, Address: Bucharest, Romania

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.section1Content: By accessing and using Marina Cociug - Lactation Consultant services, you agree to these terms and conditions. If you do not agree, please do not use our services.
terms.section2Content: We offer the following services: personalized lactation consultations (online or home visits), continuous support via WhatsApp/email between consultations, personalized breastfeeding plans, assessment and resolution of breastfeeding issues, education and resources for parents. Consultations are tailored to the individual needs of each mother and baby.
terms.section3Content: Appointments are made: online through website or by phone/WhatsApp at +40 123 456 789. Appointment confirmation via email or SMS. Online consultations require stable internet connection and Zoom/Skype app installed. For home visits, please ensure a quiet and comfortable space.
terms.section4Content: Cancellations more than 48h before: 100% refund or free rescheduling. Cancellations 24-48h before: 50% cancellation fee or rescheduling with 25% fee. Cancellations less than 24h before: no refund, rescheduling with 50% fee. In case of medical emergency (mother or baby), free rescheduling offered with medical documentation.
terms.section5Content: Payments accepted via: online bank card (Stripe), bank transfer, cash (for home visits). Fees are clearly displayed on website and include VAT. Payment is made before consultation. Invoice issued for all services.
terms.section6Content: All information discussed during consultations is strictly confidential. We respect the IBCLC Lactation Consultant Code of Ethics. We do not share information without your explicit consent, except in cases required by law.
terms.section7Content: Our consultation services do not replace medical advice. In case of severe medical problems (high fever, infections, health issues), we recommend consulting a doctor. We do not guarantee specific results, as each situation is unique. We provide support, education, and guidance based on scientific evidence and practical experience.
terms.section8Content: All content on the site (texts, images, educational materials, guides) is the property of Marina Cociug and is protected by copyright laws. Copying, distribution, or commercial use without written permission is not allowed.
terms.section9Content: We reserve the right to modify these terms. Changes will be communicated via email or on the site. Continued use of services after changes constitutes acceptance of new terms.
terms.section10Content: These terms are governed by Romanian law. Any dispute will be resolved by competent courts in Bucharest.
terms.section11Content: For questions about these terms, contact us: Email: info@marinacociug.ro, Phone: +40 123 456 789

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.section1Content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device (computer, phone, tablet) when you visit a website. They help the site function properly and provide a personalized experience.
cookies.section2Content: Essential Cookies (necessary): Ensure basic site functionality, authentication, shopping cart, security. These cannot be disabled. Performance Cookies: Collect information about how you use the site (pages visited, time spent, errors). Help us improve the site. Functional Cookies: Remember preferences (language, font size, region). Marketing Cookies (with consent only): Track activity for personalized ads on other sites.
cookies.section3Content: We use external services that may set cookies: Google Analytics (traffic analysis), Stripe (payment processing), Zoom/Skype (video consultations), Meta Pixel (for Facebook/Instagram ads, with consent only). These services have their own privacy policies.
cookies.section4Content: Session cookies: Automatically deleted when you close browser. Persistent cookies: Remain on device for specified period (from days to 2 years), depending on type.
cookies.section5Content: You can control and delete cookies through: Browser settings (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge - each has options in Settings > Privacy). Cookie consent panel on our site (at first visit). Browser tools for blocking cookies. Note: Disabling essential cookies may affect site functionality (unable to make appointments, unable to access account).
cookies.section6Content: Cookies we use: session_id (essential, 24 hours) - maintains authentication session; _ga (Google Analytics, 2 years) - unique visitor identifier; _gid (Google Analytics, 24 hours) - user behavior analysis; lang_pref (functional, 1 year) - remembers preferred language; consent_status (essential, 1 year) - stores cookie preferences.
cookies.section7Content: This policy may be updated periodically to reflect changes in technology or legislation. Last updated: December 2024.
cookies.section8Content: For questions about cookies, contact us: Email: info@marinacociug.ro, Phone: +40 123 456 789
